title: please help
body: I have to wait 20min to join game but i dont have leavebuster whats the problem?

replies.body: Leaverbuster will certainly place players in a lower priority queue after consistent leaves, but that isn't the only system that does this. [ Queue dodging](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) games constantly can place players in a lower-priority queue, which can extend if they continue to occur.  Please let me know if you have any questions!
If you mean you had to wait 20 minutes until you found a match then there's nothing we can do. There weren't many players around your skill level online at the time.
